title: Mykhaylo Meskhi
text:
Mykhaylo Meskhi (; born 26 February 1997 in <a href="Donetsk">Donetsk</a>, <a href="Ukraine">Ukraine</a>) is a <a href="professional">professional</a> <a href="Ukraine">Ukrainian</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> <a href="midfielder">midfielder</a> of Georgian descents, who plays for <a href="FC%20Mynai">FC Mynai</a>.
Career.
Meskhi is a product of the youth team system of present-day defunct FC Metalurh from his native city Donetsk.
From 2015 he plays for FC Stal Kamianske and made his debut for FC Stal in the game against <a href="FC%20Shakhtar%20Donetsk">FC Shakhtar Donetsk</a> on 4 December 2016 in the <a href="Ukrainian%20Premier%20League">Ukrainian Premier League</a>.
On 13 July 2018 he signed a contract to Hungarian first division team <a href="Mez%C5%91k%C3%B6vesdi%20SE">Mezőkövesdi SE</a>.
